concept.title: SFTP/FTP Client
concept.shortdesc: The SFTP/FTP Client origin reads files from a server using the Secure File Transfer Protocol (SFTP) or the File Transfer Protocol (FTP).

conbody.p: SFTP/FTP Client originovervieworiginsSFTP/FTP ClientWhen you configure the SFTP/FTP Client origin, you specify the URL where the files reside on the remote server and other read properties. If the server requires authentication, configure the origin to use login credentials. If using the SFTP protocol, you can also configure the origin for strict host checking.
You can configure the origin to download files to an archive directory if the origin encounters errors while reading the files.
